plan.text: Create a new draft blog post in Notion
Extract the content of the draft blog post
Use AI to generate a meta description based on the blog content
Use AI to generate 5 relevant keywords based on the blog content
Update the Notion page with the generated meta description and keywords

questions.label: Which AI model would you like to use for generating the meta description and keywords?
Where in the Notion page should the meta description and keywords be added?

discoveries.title: AI model API integration is required

pipelines.title: Generate Meta Description and Keywords
steps: Send content to AI model for meta description generation
Send content to AI model for keyword generation
Update Notion page with new meta content
